thread.title: Russell Westbrook tries trash-talking a shrugging Kevin Durant
thread.title_full: Russell Westbrook tries trash-talking a shrugging Kevin Durant

author: Alysha Tsuji
title: Russell Westbrook tries trash-talking a shrugging Kevin Durant
text:
Golden State Warriors forward Kevin Durant (35) defends as Oklahoma City Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) dribbles in the first quarter of an NBA basketball game in Oklahoma City, Saturday, Feb. 11, 2017. (Photo: AP)
As the Thunder attempted to chip at the Warriors' double-digit lead in the third quarter of the "Kevin Durant Return" game on Saturday night, former teammates Russell Westbrook and Durant exchanged words.
A timeout was called and then the two had at it.
Russell Westbrook tells Kevin Durant "I'm Coming" pic.twitter.com/Bm5qPFIiUz
â€” gifdsports (@gifdsports) February 12, 2017 Here's what reporters at the game heard: Westbrook said, "I'm coming!" and Durant responded with, "You're losing, though."
Westbrook yelling at Durant: "I'm coming"
Durant shrugging it off, believe he said: "You're gonna lose"
â€” Anthony Slater (@anthonyVslater) February 12, 2017 Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook really jawing back and forth as they go to the bench. Kevin: "You're losing though."
â€” Chris Haynes (@ChrisBHaynes) February 12, 2017 Shortly after this, Durant got into it a bit with another former teammate.
Kevin Durant and Andre Roberson get in each other's face pic.twitter.com/cLAAZrzlpD
â€” gifdsports (@gifdsports) February 12, 2017 Plus, there was this shove that Westbrook gave Durant earlier on in the game (H/T The Score for video):
https://streamable.com/e/ll63q?r=p
This is all expected for the hyped Warriors vs. Thunder matchup. Westbrook and Durant jawed a bit the last time they faced each other too.
Wonder what was said ðŸ¤” pic.twitter.com/KMirIaZiGg
â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) January 19, 2017 The Warriors have won every matchup so far. The last of the season is on March 20.
Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2ky4YTK
